title: Prizona6
sinopse:
Latitude: Unknown
Longitude: Unknown
A nameless island simply referred as The Island, where trapped are the young captives with no recollection of their pasts, in the murky fragments of reality, dream and imagination.

A girl finds herself in The Island, but she can't remember anything except a boy smile. Later, she is spotted by other 6 girls living in The Island and is named Number6.
